name: NYCSubway
0:
”Alexa, ask NYC subway for an update”
”Alexa, ask NYC subway to check the NQR line”
”open NYC subway”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. y. c. subway
des:
This is a skill that checks the status of NYC's subway lines. You can get a full update of all lines, which tells you which lines are not currently 'Good Service' or check for a status of a specific line. 

If you requested for a specific line and there are issues, the skill will add a card on the Alexa app with the description of the disruption.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
